name: Glossaire de Bibliothèque
description: Ce glossaire regroupe les termes essentiels utilisés dans le domaine des bibliothèques et de la gestion documentaire.

words.definition: A set of written or printed sheets bound together
To take and use something temporarily before returning it
A publication issued at regular intervals
A flat surface used for storing or displaying items
A sequence of moving images, often with sound, that tells a story, documents an event, or presents an artistic idea
A complete list of items, typically in systematic order
